list.name: provider
list.label: Provider
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT provider AS __text, provider AS __value FROM stats.work_item_metrics_daily ORDER BY provider

list.name: team_id
list.label: Team
list.query: SELECT id AS __value, name AS __text FROM teams UNION ALL SELECT 'unassigned' AS __value, 'Unassigned' AS __text ORDER BY __text

list.name: work_scope_id
list.label: Work Scope
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT work_scope_id AS __text, work_scope_id AS __value FROM stats.work_item_metrics_daily WHERE work_scope_id != '' ORDER BY work_scope_id

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, provider AS metric, sum(items_completed_latest) AS value FROM ( SELECT day, provider, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, work_scope_id, argMax(items_completed, computed_at) AS items_completed_latest FROM stats.work_item_metrics_daily WHERE match(provider, '${provider:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND match(work_scope_id, '${work_scope_id:regex}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, provider, team_id, work_scope_id ) GROUP BY day, provider ORDER BY day

SELECT day AS time, provider AS metric, sum(wip_latest) AS value FROM ( SELECT day, provider, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, work_scope_id, argMax(wip_count_end_of_day, computed_at) AS wip_latest FROM stats.work_item_metrics_daily WHERE match(provider, '${provider:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND match(work_scope_id, '${work_scope_id:regex}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, provider, team_id, work_scope_id ) GROUP BY day, provider ORDER BY day

panels.title: Work Item Cycle Time p50 — hours
panels.description: Computed from per-item cycle times (requires started_at and completed_at).

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, provider AS metric, quantileTDigest(0.50)(cycle_time_hours) AS value FROM stats.work_item_cycle_times WHERE match(provider, '${provider:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND match(work_scope_id, '${work_scope_id:regex}') AND cycle_time_hours IS NOT NULL AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, provider ORDER BY day

panels.title: Work Item Cycle Time p90 — hours
panels.description: Computed from per-item cycle times (requires started_at and completed_at).

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, provider AS metric, quantileTDigest(0.90)(cycle_time_hours) AS value FROM stats.work_item_cycle_times WHERE match(provider, '${provider:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND match(work_scope_id, '${work_scope_id:regex}') AND cycle_time_hours IS NOT NULL AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, provider ORDER BY day

panels.title: Time In Status (hours/day)
panels.description: Sum of time spent in each normalized status category on each day (requires status transition history; Jira uses changelog).

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, status AS metric, sum(duration_latest) AS value FROM ( SELECT day, status, provider, work_scope_id, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, argMax(duration_hours, computed_at) AS duration_latest FROM stats.work_item_state_durations_daily WHERE match(provider, '${provider:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND match(work_scope_id, '${work_scope_id:regex}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, status, provider, work_scope_id, team_id ) GROUP BY day, status ORDER BY day

panels.title: Completed Unassigned Work Items / Day
panels.description: Count of completed items that had no assignee at completion time.

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, provider AS metric, sum(done_unassigned_latest) AS value FROM ( SELECT day, provider, work_scope_id, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, argMax(items_completed_unassigned, computed_at) AS done_unassigned_latest FROM stats.work_item_metrics_daily WHERE match(provider, '${provider:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND match(work_scope_id, '${work_scope_id:regex}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, provider, work_scope_id, team_id ) GROUP BY day, provider ORDER BY day

panels.title: Predictability Score (Completion Rate)
panels.description: Ratio of Completed items to Total Load (Completed + WIP) at end of day. Higher is better (clearing the plate).

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, provider AS metric, avg(predictability_latest) AS value FROM ( SELECT day, provider, work_scope_id, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, argMax(predictability_score, computed_at) AS predictability_latest FROM stats.work_item_metrics_daily WHERE match(provider, '${provider:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND match(work_scope_id, '${work_scope_id:regex}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, provider, work_scope_id, team_id ) GROUP BY day, provider ORDER BY day
